question: Why did the electromagnet go to the gym?
Probably to work on its magnetic field strength!
Why did the electromagnet refuse to play hide and seek?
Probably because it knew it would always be found due to its magnetic field!
Why did the radio signal go to therapy?
I think it had trouble processing its emotions, just like it had trouble processing its waves!
Why did the signal processor get an award at the tech company?
Must be for filtering out all the unnecessary noise!
Why don't signal processors make good chefs?
Probably because they're always trying to minimize the ingredients!
Why did the power system refuse to play hide and seek?
Because it was afraid of blackouts!
Why was the power system the star at the comedy club?
Because it could always generate a good laugh!
Why don't power systems make good gardeners?
Because they're too busy dealing with circuits, they can't handle a circuit of watering plants!
Why do electronic devices never get invited to parties?
Because they always resist the current flow of conversation!
Why was the electronic device working out at the gym?
It was trying to amp up its resistance!
Why don't electronic devices play hide and seek?
Because good luck hiding when you're constantly emitting signals!
Why was the control system nervous at the comedy club?
Because it was worried about negative feedback loops!
Why did the control system get a medal at the race?
Because it was outstanding in its closed loop response time!
Why do control systems make good detectives?
Because they're always tracking down system errors!
Why don't communication systems play hide and seek?
Because they're always transmitting!
Why was the communications system voted prom king?
Because it was excellent at signal processing and made a noise at the right time!
Why did the communications system get a time-out?
Because it wouldn't stop broadcasting!
Why don't digital systems ever get lost?
Because they always follow a binary path!
Why was the digital system always so decisive?
Because it only knew 1s and 0s, no maybes!
What do you call a digital system's favorite dessert?
Why did the electromechanical energy converter break up with its partner?
Because it couldn't handle the constant transformation!
What did the electromagnetic field say to the mechanical energy during the conversion process?
Let's take this relationship to another level!
Why don't electromechanical energy converters make good secret agents?
Because they're always transforming!
Why did the power electronics engineer bring a bucket to work?
Because he's dealing with current flows and doesn't want to get soaked!
Why did the power electronic device go to therapy?
Because it had issues with controlling the flow of energy!
Why was the power electronic device always the life of the party?
Because it knows how to switch things up and keep the energy flowing!
Why did the high voltage engineer always carry an umbrella?
Because he is always expecting sparks to fly!
Why don't high voltage engineers ever play hide and seek?
Because good luck hiding when your presence is so electrifying!
Why did the high voltage engineer break up with his girlfriend?
Because he said the spark just wasn't there anymore!
Why did the antenna go to the party?
Because it's always ready to pick up some good vibes!
What's an antenna's favorite type of music?
Wavelengths and frequencies, it loves to keep the waves propagating!
Why did the antenna break up with the satellite dish?
It felt they were not on the same wavelength anymore!
Why did the analog circuit go to therapy?
It needed help dealing with its continuous range of emotions!
What did the analog signal say to the digital signal?
Stop being so binary, there's a whole spectrum out there!
Why did the analog circuit refuse to play chess?
Because it prefers games without clear cut 0s and 1s!
Why don't embedded systems make good secret agents?
Because they can never work alone, they're always embedded with a team!
What's an embedded system's favorite hobby?
Knitting, because it likes being intertwined and connected!
Why did the embedded system get a promotion?
Because it was always integral to the operation!
Why did the Optical Fiber break up with its partner?
Because it felt like they were losing connection!
What's an optical fiber's favorite song?
I Saw the Light, because it's always transmitting it!
Why don't optical fibers make good comedians?
Because their humor tends to be too transparent!
